title: Crime Alert 03.12.19
itunes:title: Crime Alert 03.12.19
description:
23-year-old New York man released from prison after stalking pop star Taylor Swift, only to be arrested for it AGAIN. Killer dad Chris Watts reveals to investigators he drove wife Shannan’s corpse with both tot daughters CeCe and Bella still alive. Couple claims to have found a new R. Kelly sex tape.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
